name: skinny picot headband
sizes_available: 0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 1-3 years, 3-10 years, teen/adult small, adult medium, and adult large.
notes:
* please note that this listing is for the ad-free, printable pdf version of this pattern. you can find a free version of this pattern at theturtletrunk.com and on the turtle trunk youtube channel. 

the skinny picot headband is a super quick crochet headband pattern that uses minimal yarn and includes 8 sizes! it features a fun texture that's easy to create and a tie up closure. this is a new take on my most popular pattern the picot headband which has a wider band, making it more suitable for colder weather + to keep your ears warm. this skinny picot headband has a narrower band, so it's perfect for warmer weather and keeping your hair back without adding any extra warmth to your head!

difficulty: best suited for an advanced beginner or higher

sizes included: 0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 1-3 years, 3-10 years, teen/adult small, adult medium, adult large.

supplies needed: 30-40 yards of medium (4) weight yarn, 5.50mm (i) crochet hook, yarn needle, and scissors.

pattern includes:
- gauge pattern
- reference photos
- special stitch instructions
- link to free + full video tutorial
- detailed instructions for 8 sizes ranging from newborn to adult large

original picot headband pattern - https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/picot-headband


you are more than welcome to sell your finished items, but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer. if you have any questions about this pattern please feel free to email me.

my patterns (including all photographs) are copyrighted. you may not copy, re-distribute or sell my pattern.
